scripts.dev: mkdir -p dist/assets && cp -r src/assets/* dist/assets/ && cp src/index.html dist/ && cp src/contact.html dist/ && npx @tailwindcss/cli -i ./src/input.css -o ./dist/output.css --watch
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/assets && cp -r src/assets/* dist/assets/ && cp src/index.html dist/ && cp src/contact.html dist/ && npx @tailwindcss/cli -i ./src/input.css -o ./dist/output.css --minify
